titleStmt.title: The attestation of the ministers of the county of Somerset, joyning (according to their duty) with the reverend ministers of London, and all other their brethren in the severall parts of this kingdom: who declare themselves for the truth of God, against the errors, heresies, and blasphemies of the present times.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Fr: Neile for the Tho. Underhill at the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
